title: Radar & PSoC™ 6 - Entrance Counter
description: Detect and count people entering or exiting a space using radar sensors and PSoC™ 6 processing.
long_description: This project demonstrates an entrance counter system built with Infineon's XENSIV™ 60 GHz radar sensor and PSoC™ 6. By processing radar reflections, the system detects human entry and exit events in real time, enabling accurate people counting, occupancy monitoring, and smart building automation.
